trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Canvas LMS | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with Canvas LMS | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Canvas LMS with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Canvas LMS with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Canvas.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and Canvas.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A Canvas tenant
trans-unit.target: A Canvas tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Canvas will be able to single sign into the application at your Canvas company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to Canvas will be able to single sign into the application at your Canvas company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for Canvas
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for Canvas

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Canvas.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for Canvas.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type Canvas.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type Canvas.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application Gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select Canvas, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select Canvas, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Canvas with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to Canvas with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for Canvas requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for Canvas requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the Canvas application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the Canvas application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to Canvas page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to Canvas page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the Canvas Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern https://.instructure.com, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the Canvas Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern https://.instructure.com, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure App URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at Canvas page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at Canvas page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally on your computer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your Canvas company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your Canvas company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Go to Courses \> Managed Accounts \> Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Go to Courses \> Managed Accounts \> Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane on the left, select Authentication, and then click Add New SAML Config.
trans-unit.target: In the navigation pane on the left, select Authentication, and then click Add New SAML Config.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Authentication</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Authentication</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Current Integration page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Current Integration page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Current Integration</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Current Integration</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Entity ID value, and then paste it into the IdP Entity ID textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Entity ID value, and then paste it into the IdP Entity ID textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Log On URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Log On URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Log Out URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Log Out URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Change Password URL value, and then paste it into the Change Password Link textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at Canvas dialog page, copy the Change Password URL value, and then paste it into the Change Password Link textbox.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Thumbprint value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the Certificate Fingerprint textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the Thumbprint value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the Certificate Fingerprint textbox.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: From the Login Attribute list, select NameID.
trans-unit.target: From the Login Attribute list, select NameID.

trans-unit.source: From the Identifier Format list, select emailAddress.
trans-unit.target: From the Identifier Format list, select emailAddress.

trans-unit.source: Click Save Authentication Settings.
trans-unit.target: Click Save Authentication Settings.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Canvas, they must be provisioned into Canvas.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into Canvas, they must be provisioned into Canvas.

trans-unit.source: In the case of Canvas, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of Canvas, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your Canvas tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your Canvas tenant.

trans-unit.source: Go to Courses \> Managed Accounts \> Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Go to Courses \> Managed Accounts \> Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Canvas</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Users.
trans-unit.target: Click Users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add New User.
trans-unit.target: Click Add New User.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Add a New User dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Add a New User dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add User</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add User</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Full Name textbox, type the user’s name.
trans-unit.target: In the Full Name textbox, type the user’s name.

trans-unit.source: In the Email textbox, type the user’s email address.
trans-unit.target: In the Email textbox, type the user’s email address.

trans-unit.source: In the Login textbox, type the user’s Azure AD email address.
trans-unit.target: In the Login textbox, type the user’s Azure AD email address.

trans-unit.source: Select Email the user about this account creation.
trans-unit.target: Select Email the user about this account creation.

trans-unit.source: Click Add User.
trans-unit.target: Click Add User.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other Canvas user account creation tools or APIs provided by Canvas to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other Canvas user account creation tools or APIs provided by Canvas to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the Canvas **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the Canvas **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assigning users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assigning users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
